name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK PATRICIA
description: If you are a fan - and I know most of us are - then there's no more adorable babydoll this season than Patricia. Pretty, flirty and oh-so-short, Patricia drives girls and boys crazy with her beauty and sense of fun.

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK MONARCH FIESTA
description:
冬に着るドレスって言えばちょっと重たい感じのドレスやスカートが多いと思うの。冬とはいえど私は羽根の様に軽く、明るくドレスアップをしたい♥
このシフォンのレイヤードスカート、バタフライが舞ってるの♥ これにヴィンテージのデニムシャツ、それにネイビーのPコートでコーディネート!! とっても可愛くし上がるわ♥

Winter always seems to be about heavy dresses and skirts that weigh you down. Whenever it's winter, I just want to be free, and light as a feather...or butterfly! So this skirt, with its super soft chiffon layers, and smattering of butterflies, is the perfect solution. Imagine wearing it with a vintage denim shirt and old navy blue peacoat. Yum!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK KEEPSAKE CAPE DRESS
description:
ゴージャスとしか言いようがないこのケープドレス♥ 私が今まで見たドレスの中でも1位2位を争うっていうくらい可愛いと思うの♥ 特にお気に入りのパートはこのドレスの丈!!!! とっても短くてセクシーなんだけど、それ意外は全て生地で覆われる様なドレスなの。足だけ見せてワンレベル上のセクシーを目指してみて♥

There's nothing more I can say about this other than it is GORGEOUS! Its one of the most fabulous dresses I have seen, and what I really love about it is the length: it's super short, and yet everything else is covered up. I can show off my legs, but not lose my pride! And those flowers around them hem? Adorable!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK JULIETTA
description:
学生時代はもうとうの昔の事の様。でも小さい頃からエプロンドレスが好きだったの。今回紹介するのはクラシックな形に少し捻りがきいたエプロンドレスをご紹介。どこが捻りかってそれはそれはバタフライのアップリケ達♥ 3Dで出来たバタフライ達は胸元を華やかに飾ってくれるわ♥

Even though it has been years since I was at school, I love a dress with a slight pinafore vibe. So here is a classic pinafore with a twist. And that twist is? BUTTERFLIES! Instead of school emblems or badges, give this dress a closer look and you will see it is covered with gorgeous 3D butterflies. It's just another touch of Sretsis magic...

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK BENICIO BOMBER
description:
Sretsisがストリートなアイテムを発売するのをどれだけ待っていた事か...!!! それはもちろんSretsisの世界観はガーリーでありながらエッジさを融合ブランドだからね。 でも今回はついにとってもクールなボンバージャケットが登場!! あなたのワードローブの中にあるどんなアイテムとも相性バッチリなこのボンバージャケット、半分は子猫ちゃん、半分はスケルトンのSretsisならでわのジャケット♥

I have been waiting a long time for Sretsis to go a little streety. And it makes sense - the Sretsis girl is always a little cute, and a little edgy. And so finally they have produced the coolest bomber jacket, which will go with everything I already have in my wardrobe. It's half cute kitty cat, half skeleton, but the total look is overall AMAZING!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK CORONATION CUFF
description:
取り外し可能な付け襟はもう過ぎた流行!! もう一段階進んで今度はカフスなんてどう？ パールが付いてるから、どんなオケージョンでもブレスレットの様に気軽に付けてエレガンスさを。写真にもあるように、5分袖のトップスに合わせるだけでこんなに可愛くなれるの。私はこのカフスをプレーンなカシミアのニットに合わせようかな♥

Detachable collars are SO LAST SEASON. Be one step ahead, and go for a removable cuff. It's just that kind of accessory that you can always have, and pull out for whatever occasion for that extra wow effect. I love how it is styled in the lookbook with a 3/4 sleeve, with the pearl band just covering the wrists. But I must admit that it would look great with my range of plain cashmere sweaters that I wear all winter. Time to accessorise!!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK LYNX CROPPED CAPE
description:
全シーズン、Sretsisはとっても綺麗なロングケープを発表。今回のコレクションでは、そのシリーズでとっても可愛いショートバージョンが誕生♥  ケープだけど動きやすい、実用的でもあるこのケープ。でもそんな事は気にならないくらいこのケープとっても可愛いでしょ♥

Last season, Sretsis wowed me with their long cape, and now, here it is as a capelet, a super chic edited down version of the original. Just covering the elbows, it's actually more practical than the original, giving your arms more freedom than a normal cape. But who cares about practicality when this looks so completely fabulous??!!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK CAROLA CROSS JUMPSUIT
description:
クレイジーに聞こえるかもしれないけど、このジャンプスーツ、結婚式のパーティにもっとも最適なドレスになると思わない？ この下にクリスプな白シャツを着て、ジャケットを上から羽織るの。想像してみただけで会場の視線を集める事が出来るわ♥ ドレスじゃなくて、これからはジャンプスーツをドレスに♥

Now hear me out, because I know you are going to think I am crazy. But don't you just think this is the most amazing jumpsuit to wear to a wedding party? Just imagine it worn over a crisp white shirt, and maybe worn with a slick black jacket, and there you have the most amazing party look EVER! Who needs a dress?

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK MONARCH WING SHORTS
description:
女の子にとってショーツはどの季節も、どんな年も必要不可欠なアイテム。どんなに買っても、新しいショーツはいつだって欲しい。今回のコレクションで、ショーツはこのアイテムだけ。だからショーツ好きのあなたに是非この特別な一枚を!!! シルキーな素材にこのプリント。決まりね♥

The way I look at it, shorts are an absolute necessity in any wardrobe all year round. And as a compulsive shopper, like you out there, I can't get enough of them. So if you are investing into this Winter Break collection, these are kinda essential, as they are the only shorts. And if you are simply looking for a special pair of shorts with a silky feel and amazing print, stop right here!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK MONARCH MARBELLA JUMPSUIT
description:
数年前、私の親友がSpainのMarbellaにお引っ越ししたの。彼女のFacebookの写真には、とっても楽しそうなパーティの写真や、ビキニを陽気に踊る人たちの写真がいっぱい!! でもMarbellaにいる女の子達はこんなジャンプスーツを履いてる人は少ないみたい...だから東京の女の子達に紹介したいの♥ エッジが効いてるけどエレガントでもあるこのジャンプスーツ、価格もとっても優しいの♥

A few years ago my friend moved to Marbella, in Spain, and all I ever see over Facebook is pictures of her at fabulous parties and people wearing bikinis. So I am not sure if this Monarch Marbella Jumpsuit is exactly what I would wear if I were in Spain - but it is exactly right for me here in Tokyo! It's super edgy and elegant at the same time, and if you ask me, amazing value.

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK FLUTTER JUMPSUIT
description:
ジャンプスーツは夏だけのアイテムじゃないわ♥ ドレスアップする事にルールなんてないの。 冬は暗い色ばかりを着る季節じゃないの!! 私はジャンプスーツが大好き。そんな私がこのジャンプスーツの可愛さを説明する必要もないわね♥ このバタフライを見て!!♥

And who said jumpsuits are just for summer? Part of the fun of modern dressing is that there are no rules. Who said winter has to be filled with dark colours? Personally I am a big fan of jumpsuits, and if I own a jumpsuit like this - with its smattering of luminescent butterflies and adorable duffle top - you can guarantee I will be wearing it any time I please!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK MIRIUM SKIRT
description:
ウエスト周りに散りばめられたお花達のプリント。まるでBabylonで咲き誇るお花達の様♥  世界一美しいとされていたミステリアスな今は存在しない幻のガーデン。そんな美しい風景が想像できるこのスカートはSretsisならではの可愛さが...♥

This skirt, with its cascade of flowers from the waist, looks like it has stepped right out of the Hanging Gardens of Babylon, those mythical gardens which were considered the most beautiful in the world. Like the gardens, this skirt is one of the most beautiful I have ever seen - distinctive, elegant, and so, so pretty!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK BENICIO SKIRT
description:
この手のスカート、私はスケータースカートって呼んでるの。小さい頃見ていたアイススケーターを思い出させるわ。ほんの少しラッフルで、綺麗なフレアシルエット。歩いていてもダンスしても綺麗なシルエットを演出してくれるはず♥ このホワイトレオパードプリントが一層アイスプリンセスにしてくれる♥

This kind of skirt, what I like to call a "skater skirt" reminds me of the skirts of those ice skaters I used to watch as a little girl. Slightly ruffled, and with a nice flare, just imagine how gorgeous it would look when it twirls! And there's something really regal about this snow leopard print - looks fit for an ice princess!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK BUTTERFLY SKULL RUFFLE
description:
女の子らしくてちょっぴりセクシーなスカートって大好き!!! 腰回りは少しタイトに、裾がラッフルになってる一捻りあるこのSretsisのスカート。40年代のハリウッドの女優が着ている画が想像出来るこのアイテムは、オフィスにもダンスパーティにもピッタリ♥ ミニスカートだけど、シルエットに人と差をつけたいあなたにオススメ♥ それにこのプリント、もう文句無しでしょ♥

I love a flirty little ra-ra skirt, a skirt that has a kick. And this one, with its fitted body and ruffled hem, reminds me of something that those old Hollywood actresses in the 1940s used to wear to the office, or out to a dance. It's more than a mini, but the length is sassy and pretty. And with this super cool print, it's going to dance its way into your life. I know it.

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK BUTTERFLY BLOUSE
description:
バタフライ好きのあなたに必見♥ これを身にまとえばあなたもバタフライになれるわ♥ このSretsisのバタフライブラウスはそんな乙女心をぐっとつかんでくれる、そんなアイテム。風に揺られるバタフライの襟、ワイドスリーブは女子力をアップしてくれるとってもキュートな一枚♥

For those of you who just love anything to do with butterflies, here's an opportunity to actually become one! Well, maybe not become one, but maybe feel a bit like one while you wear the Sretsis Butterfly Blouse. Once the wide sleeves and butterfly collar get caught in the breeze, you might get swept away with the dream!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK CORONATION BLOUSE
description:
もしこのWinter Breakのルックブックを見た事がある人ならお気づきの人も多いはず。このコレクションはレイヤリングがたくさん使われたコレクション。 このブラウスは写真でもジャンプスーツの下に着ていたり、色んな物のインナーとして大活躍。フリルの襟とコントラストが可愛いカフス、袖周りにはパールが散りばめられてる♥ どんなアウトフィットにも、どんなオケージョンにも♥

If you have seen the Sretsis Winter Break lookbook, you will realise that this is the ultimate layering piece of the season, the must-have piece that goes (or under) with almost everything. Im totally into the clerical collar and those fabulous contrast cuffs, it is the perfect blouse for any outfit, any season.

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK CAROLA CROSS TOP
description:
もしとってもいい子が教会に行くとしたら、私はきっとちょっとやんちゃなバッドガール。なぜなら休みの日はこのトップスを着てミュージックフェスティバルに行く事しか考えてないの!! 袖がシアー素材、とってもキュートなお花のクロスのプリント。私だったらBrooklynで見つけたヴィンテージのレーススカートに合わせたい♥ それにWanda Nylonのコートを上から羽織って準備はばっちり♥

If good girls go to church, then I must be a bad girl because all I can think of is wearing this amazing floral cross print to a music festival! There's something so cool about the soft transparent sleeves, and the bold but gorgeous print. Personally, I would wear it with a long vintage lace skirt that I found in Brooklyn, and throw a Wanda Nylon trench over the top, and I'm set!

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK BUTTERFLY FLUTTER BLOUSE
description:
この冬はたくさんのケープを買ったの。 とくに肩をカバーしてくれるトップスにはまってるわ♥ フリル仕様のブラウス、全シーズン大人気だったコウモリのプリントはまさにSretsisならではのとってもキュートなアイテム。このトップスにハイウエストのデニムショーツを合わせる予定♥ あなたはどんな風にコーディネートする？？

I've taken to wearing a lot of capes lately, and for winter I am loving tops that cover my shoulders. This flutter blouse, with its distinctive Sretsis print in contrasting colours, is pure joy. It's a special piece, something that will be a reminder of the season, and will bring you so much happiness. I know I will be wearing mine with my high waisted denim shorts this season. How will you wear yours?

name: SRETSIS WINTER BREAK UNICORN DANCE CROP
description:
ついにIheart上陸のSretsisのWinter Breakコレクション!! その一番始めに紹介するアイテムがこのクロップトップ!! 毎シーズンマストバイの完璧なシルエットのクロップドトップ!! でもただのクロップドトップじゃなくて、これはユニコーンのスケルトンが♥ ソフトにプリントされた周りにはデイジーやバタフライ達が。とってもSretsisなこのアイテム。ユニコーンが嫌いな人なんていないでしょ？

So the magical Winter Break collection from Sretsis is finally here, and the first top I am introducing to you is - you guessed it! - a crop top! It's every season's must-buy silhouette. But this isn't any ordinary crop - it's got a unicorn's skeleton on it, softly printed on it as it frolics amongst the daisies and butterflies. So fabulously Sretsis. And who can ever refuse a unicorn?

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND STARBURST TEE
description:
人生には息抜きも必要。不機嫌になるには人生は短すぎるわ!! 退屈でコンサバな人生なんて嫌だもの。 人生は楽しく、そんなときは迷わずHouse of HollandのTシャツを♥ 見る人が見れば、彼のTシャツってすぐ分かるの。胸元にグリッターバーストのパッチワークが♥

I like to go through life not taking everything so seriously. Life is too short to be grumpy, boring and conservative! So when it comes to fun, a house of Holland tee is a no-brainer. It's instantly recognisable, fun and fabulous. And who doesn't want 2 big embroidered, glitter starbursts on their boobs?!

グリッターパッチワークTシャツ

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 35cm
袖丈 23cm
着丈 63cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND DENIM TOP
description:
デニムで作れるアイテムは数知れず見てきた。みんなもそうだと思うの。
そんなときにHenry Hollandはこの一度見たら忘れられないベルスリーブトップをデニムでクリエイト。 ベルスリーブ部分はなんとも言えないキュートなドット柄♥

What can I say? Just when I thought I had seen everything that can be done with denim, Henry Holland comes along and creates this remarkable cropped bell-sleeve top. If the cropped bleached section wasn't perfection enough, there's those incredible polkadot sleeves. And you know how much we all love a good dot!!!

ベルスリーブデニムトップ

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 43cm
袖丈 14cm
着丈 48cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND STARBURST SILK TEA DRESS
description:
このドレスの名前はちょっとカフェに行くときに、なんてところから由来が来てるTea Dress。でも私にとってこのドレスは夜遊びに行くときに♥ 1940年代風のクラシックなシルクドレス。 とっても着心地がいいの。このドレスを着て町中を歩いて、男性の注目を独り占め♥

Well, I know the name of this dress is a Tea Dress, but to me it looks perfect for going out dancing! It looks like a classic silk dress from the 1940s, something my grandmother would have loved! I tried this on and it felt so soft and like a dream, the way it floats off the body from the fitted waist. I am sure you will agree, it's a starburst dream!

スターバースト柄シルクドレス

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 36cm
袖丈 28cm
ウエスト 67cm
着丈 91cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND SILK TEA DRESS
description:
ポップなアイテムが人気のHouse of Hollandが、こんなラブリーなTeaドレスを発表!!! このヴィンテージレトロなカリフラワープリントは70年代を彷彿とさせる。それでもどこか現代のバイブも感じる事が出来る不思議なアイテム。 シルクで体を綺麗に見せてくれるこのドレス、オフィスにも最適だと思わない?! 

It's unexpected that such a pop brand like House of Holland would do such an adorable Tea dress such as this. Everything about it screams "perfection!" With its retro "cauliflower" print, that reminds me of something from the 1970s, it has a vintage feel, but is still crisp and new. And dare I say it's perfect for the office? And because it is silk, it is so gorgeous on the body. Adore! 

フラワープリントドレス

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 36cm
袖丈 28cm
ウエスト 67cm
着丈 91cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND JACQUARD JESS DRESS
description:
ベルスリーブ!!! このベルスリーブの袖がとっても可愛いと思わない?! ラグランカットの肩のライン、オーバーサイズのネックラインは着ていてとっても楽。 第一印象で勝負出来る今回のコレクションのメインとも言えるこのドレス!!! 生地もしっかりとしたジャカード素材。このスターバーストのプリントは、まさにクリスマスライト、もしくはニューイヤーの花火の様♥

One word: Bell SLEEVES! OK, that's two, but you know what I mean! How gorgeous are the sleeves on this dress?!! With its wide raglan cut, and oversized neck, this dress, which is not fitted but instead sits straight, is incredibly flattering and makes such an impression. The hardy jacquard fabric has a lot to do with it's glamour too. If you look at the starburst print, it could be Christmas lights, or New Year's fireworks!

スターバーストプリントベルスリーブドレス

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 46.5cm
袖丈 15cm
着丈 83cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND SILVER CRYSTAL RUFFLE TOP
description:
ショート丈のトップスは今まさにItアイテム。 とはいっても世の中にショート丈のトップスは山ほど有るわね。 でもこのトップスはクリスタルが散りばめられてる。それにベルスリーブで生地もしっかりしてるの♥
昼はボーイフレンドデニムと合わせたり、夜はゴージャスなブラックペンシルスカートと合わせたり♥ 万能だと思わない???

So we all know that crop tops are my current obsession. But what fascinated me is how many different types of crop top there are. This crop top, studded with crystals, is definitely one of the best: I can see it work with some great boyfriend denims for day, or with a gorgeous black pencil skirt for night. Can't you??

クリスタル付きベルスリーブトップス

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 43.5cm
袖丈 15cm
着丈 47.5cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND JIGSAW RUFFLE HEM DRESS
description:
このパーティシーズンにバッチリなタイミングで登場するのがこのドレス。
今年らしい、とっても可愛くて都会的なドレスをご紹介!!! 少しレトロな香りがするこのマーベル、それにラッフルになったスカート。ゴージャスなジグソー柄♥ 私はこのドレスに恋に落ちたの♥

I think the timing for this amazing dress is perfect. It's party season, and there is no more fabulous party dress than this! Imagine walking into a room with this retro marvel, with its bell sleeves and ruffled hem. And then there's the amazing patchwork jigsaw pattern - it's so striking and gorgeous, I am in love!

ジグソー柄ジャカードドレス

UK6 (US4)
袖丈 23cm
着丈 86.5cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND GLITTER STARBURST SWEAT
description:
このスェットシャツは奇抜。それでいてとっても楽しみがいのあるアイテムだと思うの。どんな風にコーディネートしたいかにもよるけど、ガーリーにもキュートにも。クラッシーにも奇抜にもいろんなスタイルに挑戦したいわ♥ そんな時にマルチに活躍してくれる事間違い無しのこのスェット!! スェットも今では立派なファッションアイテムね♥

Well, I have to admit, this sweatshirt is outrageous. But isn't it so much fun at the same time? Sometimes I have mood swings with fashion: depending on how I feel, I could dress girly, cute, bold, or classy (but I always seem to want to dress comfy!). And sometimes I just want to have fun! And as far as fun goes, this is the sweat.

グリッターワッペン付きジャンパー

UK6 (US4)
ラグランスリーブの為首元から裾まで 72cm
着丈 61cm

UK8 (US6)
ラグランスリーブの為首元から裾まで 75cm
着丈 62.5cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND GLITTER TEE DRESS
description:
私はレイヤードのクイーン。この大きめのTシャツドレスはきっとレイヤードのしがいがあるはず♥ ちょっと肌寒い日はタイツを忘れないで。これにロンググローブなんか付けたらとっても可愛いかも!! それにゴージャスなコートを羽織ってみてもいいかも♥ ジャケットを脱いだらパーティスタイルに!! ファッションインスピレーションは？って人に聞かれたら、"ミラーボールよ!!"ってね♥

I am the queen of layering, and I just love the feeling of an oversized tee dress being close to my skin, even when the weather gets cooler. I would make sure I had a pair of tights on underneath this, and I would probably wear it with a pair of long gloves, and definitely a big gorgeous coat. So when I take the coat off indoors, it's time for the big reveal: the glitter print. When people ask you what your biggest fashion inspiration is, you must answer them honestly, saying "the mirror ball, silly!"

グリッタープリントTシャツドレス

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 41.5cm
袖丈 16cm
着丈 91cm
着丈

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND GLITTER PRINTED SHIRT
description:
まるで満開のフラワープリントの様に見えるこのグリッタープリント。一見難しそうに見えるこのアイテム。 ボタンを上まで閉めて、クリスプなブルーのブレザー、もしくはPコートにデニムのスカート。とってもラブリーに仕上げてくれるわ。やっぱりファッションは楽しくなきゃね!!! 人に注目されるシャツ、そんな言葉がピッタリのシャツを是非♥

OK so imagine this shirt was a liberty floral shirt instead of its glitter print - it really isn't so different actually - and then it's easy to see how you will be wearing this shirt. Buttoned up underneath a crisp blue blazer or pea coat, worn with a denim skirt, it's actually lovely, as well as being fun and noticeable. It will catch people by surprise when they see the shirt's print up close and realise it's glitter.

グリッタープリントクリスタル付きシャツ

UK6 (US4)
肩幅 37.5cm
袖丈 62cm
着丈 69.5cm

UK8 (US6)
肩幅 39cm
袖丈 62cm
着丈 70cm

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND EMBELLISHED GLITTER TEE
description:
きっとHenryがこのTシャツをデザインしたとき、"よし、グリッタープリントTをデザインしよう!!"って思ったに違いない。でもそれだけじゃないのがこのTシャツ。クリスタルでカバーされているの!!! グリッターが好きな私はこの子に一目惚れ。とーーーーーっても可愛いでしょ♥

When Henry Holland designed this tee, I know he was thinking: "So I want to do a digital glitter print tee. But that's not enough! It needs to be covered in crystals!" And so this t-shirt was born, and thank god for it as it fulfills all of my glitter fantasies. And what's more? It's actually really, really pretty. You're gonna love it.

グリッタープリントクリスタル付きTシャツ

name: HOUSE OF HOLLAND DENIM PATCHWORK SHIRT
description:
70年代を謳歌してきた私の従姉は少し年上。 私が子供の頃、よく従姉にいらなくなった洋服をもらっていたの。それはどこかファンキーで今思えばレトロな物ばかりもらっていたわ。だから未だにヴィンテージが好きなのかもしれない。だからこのパッチワークのデニムシャツはそんな昔を思い出させるの♥ デトロイトのレトロなファッションに、クールなミュージック達。とっても素敵♥

My cousins are a lot older than me. They grew up in the 1970s. So when I was a kid, I was always passed their hand-me-downs, which were always a little funky and definitely a decade or two too late (maybe that's why I love vintage so much??). This patchwork denim shirt reminds me a lot of my cousins, and of that whole Detroit retro fashion and music movement. Its just so cool. 

デニムパッチワークシャツ

テイラードのスカートって今までに見た事ないでしょ？ こんな素敵な物、なんで私のクローゼットに今まで存在してなかったのか...!!! 履き心地がいいことはもちろん、なんてったって見た目も可愛い♥ 散りばめられたクリスタルがさらにゴージャス感を演出!!!

Now here's something that I think is totally ingenious - a tailored sweat skirt - and it makes me wonder why I don't already have something like this in my wardrobe. Well, after doing some research, it seems like it's quite a rare thing. But that's crazy, because the only thing that could be more comfortable than this is a pair of track pants - and this is so much more amazing. It's been great watching the humble sweatshirt become elevated into a real fashion item. Honestly, there's nothing I love more than just throwing on a super comfy, warm sweatshirt, whether I am going shopping, or just heading to the combini. It helps, however, if the sweatshirt is covered in crystals, like this one. Reminds you that even though you are comfortable, you are looking dazzling!

And this Butterfly Twinkle top, with its fluorescent sequin body and its adorable organza butterfly collar is just that. Total fabulous fun.

description:

description:

I know that all you girls are sweatshirt crazy, so here's the deal. Take a sweatshirt and give it the classic Parisian elegance of box quilting. Then make it out of waterproof PVC, so you can wear it in the middle of winter in rain or snow. Then make sure it is lined in soft cotton for comfort. And finally, make sure the collar and cuffs are soft jersey, to maintain that edge. This might just be the coolest sweatshirt you will ever own. And it's going to last you forever.
